questions.question_text: Which API is used to change the configuration of a device group that contains Cisco Catalyst 9000 Series Switches?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct

Selected Answer: D
A. xAPI (Cisco Collaboration xAPI) is a set of APIs for Cisco collaboration products, not typically used for configuring network devices.

 B. Cisco Finesse is a web-based collaboration framework for integrating third-party applications with Cisco Unified Contact Center Enterprise (UCCE).

 C. JTAPI (Java Telephony Application Programming Interface) is a Java-based API for integrating telephony features with Java applications, typically used in the context of Cisco Unified Communications Manager.

Answer has to be D

Selected Answer: D
I think is correct

Selected Answer: C
C is correct
